src:
Kil je motor koji ne staje, povrede muče Vardar
Jedina neporažena ekipa u najjačim grupama Lige šampiona na vrućem gostovanju u Ukrajini. Šampion Evrope posle dva debakla želi da se vrati u pobednički ritam

03 Nov 2019

Posle nepunih šest kola rukometne Lige šampiona jedina ekipa iz dve najjače grupe koja još nije osetila gorčinu poraza je Kil. Nemački vicešampion posle godine pauze vratio se u elitu, igra fantastično pod komandom legendarnog Filipa Jihe, kome je ovo debitantska sezona kao glavnog trenera Zebri sa Baltika. Čeh je prošle sezone kupio zanat od Islanđanina Alfreda Gislasona, a pokazao je da je sazreo da vodi giganta koji se vraća na staze stare slave.
U šestom kolu Kil gostuje Motoru u Zaporožju (17.00). Domaćin je prošle sezone u Ligi šampiona bio mnogo bolji, opasniji, teže su se osvajali bodovi u Ukrajini. Ove sezone, Motor je veliko razočaranje, ima samo bod posle pet kola.
Kil igra sjajno, ređa pobede kako u evro eliti, tako i u Bundesligi. Nemački vicešampion je u seriji od 10 pobeda u svim takmičenjima. Blista na golu Danac Niklas Landin Jakobsen, u napadu se nezadrživi Harald Reinkind i Nikola Bilik, dok ključ u odbrani drži kapiten Domagoj Duvnjak.
Kil je posle remija na svom terenu na premijeri takmičenja protiv Vive Kjelcea vezao četiri trijumfa. U gostima je slavio u Vespremu, pregazio šampiona Vardar u Skoplju sa čak 11 golova razlike, pa se crno piše i ekipi iz Zaporožja.



Branilac krune Vardar dobro je počeo sezonu sa tri pobede, ali su onda krenuli problemi. U dva meča sa favoritima Kilom i Vespremom skopski crveno-crni su završili sa minusom od 20 pogodaka. Trener Eduard Kokšarov ima problema sa povredama bitnih igrača, pogotovo zemljaka Pavela Atmana, Sergeja Gorpišina i Gleba Kalaraša koji su se vratili roviti posle reprezentativne akcije Zbornaje u Argentini. Nije 100 odsto spreman ni kapiten Stojanče Stoilov pred dolazak u makedonsku prestonicu beloruskog Meškova iz Bresta (17.00) u dvorani Jane Sandanski.
Ipak, treba očekivati pobedu šampiona Evrope u kom god sastavu da izađe. Brest je loš, ima samo jednu pobedu, a na gostovanjima ove sezone u evro eliti je oba puta poražen.
Mađarski vicešampion Seged na svom terenu imaće lak posao protiv ove sezone podmlađenog Celja. Derbi začelja u Grupi A igra se u Norveškoj gde će Zagreb Veselina Vujovića pokušati da uzme prve bodove u Ligi šampiona protiv Elveruma. Oba tima su na nuli, ali pobednik ima šanse za šestu poziciju koja vodi u prvu nokaut fazu.
Sistem takmičenja u Ligi šampiona je isti kao i prethodne sezone. Iz prve dve grupe najbolji tim ide direktno u četvrtfinale, dok ekipe od drugog do šestog mesta odlaze u osminu finala. Iz slabijih grupa C i D po dva najbolja tima igraće u baražu za osminu finala.
Titulu brani Vardar koji je prošle sezone u Kelnu pobedio u finalu Vesprem.

text:
Kil is a non-stop engine, Vardar is hurting his injuries
The only undefeated team in the strongest Champions League groups on a hot visit to Ukraine. The champion of Europe after two debacles wants to return to the winning rhythm

03 Nov 2019

After less than six rounds of Champions League handball, the only team in the two strongest groups that have not yet felt the bitterness of defeat is Kil. The German vice-champion has returned to the elite after a year's break, playing fantastically under the command of the legendary Philip Jicha, who is making his debut season as head coach of the Baltic Zebra. The Czech bought the craft from Icelandic Alfred Gislason last season, and has shown that he has matured to lead the giant returning to the paths of old glory.
In the sixth round, Kil visits the Engine in Zaporozhye (5pm). The host last season in the Champions League was much better, more dangerous, harder to score in Ukraine. This season, the Motor is a big disappointment, only scoring after five rounds.
Kil plays great, less likely to win in both the Euro elite and the Bundesliga. The German vice-champion is in a series of 10 wins in all competitions. Glittering on goal from Denmark's Niklas Landin Jakobsen, the unstoppable Harald Reinkind and Nikola Bilik attack, while captain Domagoj Duvnjak holds the key in defense.
Keel tied four triumphs after a draw at home at the premiere of the competition against Viva Kjelce. He celebrated in Veszprém, beat champion Vardar in Skopje with as many as 11 goals, and black is also written to the team from Zaporozhye.



The Vardar crown defender started the season well with three wins, but then problems started. In two matches with favorites Kilo and Veszprém, Skopje's Red-Blacks finished with minus 20 hits. Coach Eduard Koksharov has problems with injuries to important players, especially fellow countrymen Pavel Atman, Sergei Gorpishin and Gleb Kalarash, who returned to the trenches after a representative Zbornaja action in Argentina. Captain Stoyanche Stoilov is also not ready 100% before the arrival in the Macedonian capital of the Belarusian Meshkov from Brest (17.00) in the Jane Sandanski Hall.
Still, one should expect a European Champion victory in whatever squad to come out. Elm is bad, has only one victory, and in away games this season in the Euro elite has been defeated both times.
Hungarian vice-champion Szeged will have an easy job in his field against this season of rejuvenated Celje. The Group A underdog derby is being played in Norway where Zagreb's Veselin Vujovic will try to take the first points in the Champions League against Elverum. Both teams are at zero, but the winner has a chance of a sixth position leading into the first knockout phase.
The Champions League competition system is the same as in the previous season. From the first two groups the best team goes directly to the quarterfinals, while the teams from second to sixth go to the eighth finals. From the weaker C and D groups, the top two teams will each play in the eighth finals.
The title is defended by Vardar, who won the Veszprém final in Cologne last season.
